Turnip prices?

Of course! What exactly are you offering? ...offering?
Now, we have a policy in place of not buying turnips on Sundays. I'm sure you understand. So, what would you like to sell?
Ummm Sincerest apologies, but since it's Sunday, some items, such as turnips, are off the table nowSorry for the trouble, but please reselect what you'd like to sell.
Ah My apologies, but We cannot accept any fake works of artI'm sorry for the hassle, but please reselect what you'd like to sell.
! Sure! How about if I offer you ?
Sold!
Actually, I'll pass.
Ah Could this be Oh! Don't mind me! Just rambling.I can give you for your .

Actually, I'll pass.

Sold!

OH! This is the DIY recipe for !This is an extremely valuable recipe. Are you really sure you want to part with it? I can give you

Oh I'm sorry, but I can't pay you for items like this.I can dispose of it for free if you don't need it, though.
Take my trash!
I'll take my trash back.
Look at all the fine things you've brought in today! Allow me just a moment to run the numbers
Look at all the fine things you've brought in today!<10_4 /> Wait Are they sellingOh! It's nothing! Nothing! I'll start running the numbers
Look at this fine selection! Let's see I'll run the numberstake any high-value hot items
And done! I can buy these from you for a total of . Sound good?
Sold!
Actually, I'll pass.
So many fine thi Huh? I'm seeing an extremely valuable recipe in the mix. Are you sure about this?
It's fine. Go ahead.
Er, no. Hold on a sec.
Understood! ...understood! I'll just run the numbers
Understood! ...understood! Well, I'll run the numbers, taking any hot items into consideration
And done!There is a portion of your submission I cannot pay Bells for. I can dispose of any unwanted items, though. That said, your total comes out to . Sound good?
Sold!
Actually, I'll pass.
Oh I'm sorry, but I can't pay you for items like these.I can dispose of them for free if you don't need these things, though.
Take my trash!
I'll take my trash back.
Thank you! Please come again! ...again!
Understood! ...understood! We'll take care of disposal.
Thank you for your business! I'll go ahead and put any excess Bells into bags in your pockets!
Thank you very much! Your wallet and pockets are full, so I'll just wire the payment to your account.
Oh dear! ...oh dear!It doesn't seem like you can carry your full payment at this time, so I can't pay youPlease take a moment to organize your belongings, then talk to me again. ...again!

Oh, before I forget! I wanted to tell you something about the fruit you just sold meWhen you eat food like fruit, you'll find yourself energized with more power than you might have imagined. Has anyone shared that with you?
What I mean is, you could break open rocks or maybe even dig up a whole tree if you had the right tool!
What I mean is, you could break open rocks or maybe even dig up a whole treewith a shovel, of course.
Now, it's fine for you to sell me your fruit, but you should try eating it once in a while too! ...too!
Curious about what's in the cabinet? Here's what we have today! ...today!
The current price for turnips is per turnip!
On Sundays we take a little break from buying turnips.<10_4 /> Please check back in with us tomorrow.
Here's what we have to sell today.
Anything else look interesting?
Show me again!
I'm alright!
Yes, yes! Of course! Feel free to look all you want.
would be .
I'll buy it!
Actually, I'll pass.
Oh! Interested in a fishing rod?You can build one for free, you know, in President Nook's DIY workshop. So I'd suggest that route. This one costs .<10_4 /> Are you still interested? ...interested?
I'll buy it!
Actually, I'll pass.
Seems like you're interested in .
Those are in limited supply, so act fast if you're serious.

I'll buy it!

I'll buy it!

Actually, I'll pass.
You haven't attempted a DIY project here on the island yet, correct?
Right now, the boss is offering a free DIY workshop, so please give that a try first!
Right now, the boss is offering a free DIY workshop inside Resident Services, so please try that first!
I do believe you've purchased this already, !
"" is a digital DIY recipe book! ...book!
This contains simple DIY recipes that use materials you can easily obtain.
This contains recipes that require an interesting variety of materials.
This contains a mix of recipes that require a mastery of various materials!
I'll send the recipe data to your app immediately if you decide to make a purchase.
OK, time to send the recipes from "" to your phone
And we're done!<10_4 /> I hope you enjoy DIY even more now with your new recipes! ...new recipes!
Oh! I'm afraid we can only sell that to customers who have the DIY app.If you'd like to learn more about DIY, you should stop by Resident Services once you get back to your island.
, I'm pretty sure you already have this recipe.But if you still want to buy it, it'll cost . Are you still interested? ...interested?
I'll buy it!
Actually, I'll pass.
This is a DIY recipe used to create a flimsy watering can.
This is a DIY recipe used to create a flimsy shovel.
This is a DIY recipe used to create a vaulting pole.
This is a DIY recipe used to create a slingshot.
This is a DIY recipe used to create a flimsy axe!
This is a DIY recipe used to create a ladder!
This is a recipe for a simple watering can made out of wood.
With a watering can, you can water flowers and enjoy gardening.This is a must-have item for anyone who wants to create rare, colorful flowers through crossbreeding.
This is a recipe for a simple shovel made out of wood.

Shovels are useful for making holes in the ground. You can dig things upand bury them too!You can also smack large rocks to chip off smaller stones and other important materials.It's the kind of tool you'll always want to have on hand! ...have on hand!
This is a recipe for a vaulting pole made out of wood.
You can use a vaulting pole to hop over rivers!It's a handy item to have when you live on an island like this one.
This is a recipe for a slingshot.
You can use a slingshot to knock items out of the skyYou never know when you might want to bring something down, so may as well carry one around with you!
This is a recipe for a basic axe made from a stone and tree branches.

Hit a tree with an axe and you'll get something absolutely necessary for any DIY enthusiast: wood! What's more, the flimsy axe has a rounded stone blade, so you won't chop down any trees when using it. That makes it a must-have item, something to carry at all times if you want to live the DIY life here! ...here!
This is a recipe for a ladder made from wood!
You can use a ladder to climb up or down cliffs that are about your height—maybe a little taller.It's one of those handy tools for island living that you always want to have on hand! ...on hand!
Thank you for your purcha—<10_7 arg="20" />Oh! You, ah, don't have enough money in your pockets.Our shop doesn't offer a line of credit, so please come back when you have more money. ...money!
Thank you for your purcha—<10_7 arg="20" />Whoa! You're already carrying so many things!Maybe you can come back after you make room in your pockets. ...pockets!
Excellent purchase! ...purchase!
Yes, thank you for the !
The high-value hot item of the day is !
The hot items of the day are: and .
We pay twice the usual amount for hot items, so go ahead and bring 'em in! ...bring 'em in!
! I'll give twice the usual amount, so . Is that OK?
Sold!
Actually, I'll pass.
? I can sell in singles or in bulk. How many would you like?
Just 1. ()
I'll take 5! ()
I've changed my mind.
Ah, ? These are a limited-time offer for the month of October! ...October!
You can harvest these pumpkin starts a few days after you plant them.And they'll grow all by themselves, but you'll get a better harvest if you water them daily.
Pumpkins grow in four colors: orange, green, yellow, and white.You won't know what color you're going to get until they start growing. It makes harvest time a real treat!
I can sell these as singles or in bulk. How many would you like?
Just 1. ()
I'll take 5! ()
I've changed my mind.
Aha! Thinking of swimming? Yes, yesyou'll most definitely need .Well, before you head to the beach, perhaps we could give you a few pointers about swimming! ...swimming!

I don't have any pointers on your form, unfortunately. Just the basics about getting into the water.So, first things first, you'll want to put on a suitable wet suit like this . Once you're suited up, just press  from the beach or nearby rocks to hop into the water!To swim around, keep pressing . Oh! And if you see a shadow, you can press  to dive and check it out. You never know what kind of sea creatures might be lurking! Perhaps you could bring one to the surface
Well, I think that covers everything you'll need to know! ...know!So, back to the item at hand. It can be yours for .Would you like to buy this ?
I'll buy it!
Can you repeat that?
Actually, I'll pass.
Of course! Here's everything you need to keep in mind for swimming in the ocean. ...ocean.
Ah, you're interested in ?I should let you know that those are a limited-time itemavailable only during October! ...October!
Because we expect high demand for this seasonal item, sales are limited to just one per customer per day.
Would you like to buy one?
I'll buy it!
Actually, I'll pass.
Oh, I'm so sorry, but we can only sell each customer one piece of candy per day.
Since you've already purchased one piece today, I do hope you'll come back tomorrow for another.
You've already purchased one piece today, and I'm afraid that this is the last day it will be available this year.I do hope you'll come back for more at the next possible opportunity!
Thank you! ...thank you!<10_7 arg="90" />
Hello! ...hello! Welcome to Nook's Cranny!
Welcome! ...welcome! Oh, ! You've come to shop! ...shop!
! You've come to shop! ...shop!
We've got all sorts of furniture and goods. I'm sure you'll find something useful here!
Take your time, and have a nice look around! ...look around!
We're very proud of our selection. Please take your time and look around! ...look around!
Um As much as we do enjoy your companyit's past our closing hours for today.<10_7 arg="180" />But we'll look forward to seeing you here again another time! ...another time!<10_7 arg="90" />
Oh? Are you sure? Well, if there's anything else I can help you with, please let me know. ...know!
Understood! Please let me know if you need anything else. ...else!
Oh! Changed your mind? Anything else catch your eye?
Ah, changed your mind? Please let me know if there's anything else I can help with!
I'll be here if you need anything else.
Thank you! Please don't hesitate to ask me for assistance.
Thank you! ...thank you!
Understood! ...understood! Please let me know if you need help with anything else! ...anything else!
Well then, please don't hesitate to ask if you need assistance! ...assistance!
